text: Khale inruoiya kei kadiang Pathian minriang kutchooi nape jarra kei'n nangni rakipdiang kanati. Nangni'n ning esik kasuok kheella ningtheinuo inliakdoomma inngaidonmaru, khawa neek achu Pathian in nangnidiang inape inngamna dungjuiya ning ingaidon khan malung kadaiya ningtheinuomma chong intanru.
